topHospitals.name: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Delhi

hospitals.name: Health 4u Multispeciality Clinic
hospitals.description: Known for a wide range of specialties including orthopedics, neuro psychiatry, deaddiction, ENT, and general cases like diabetes and thyroid problems. They boast full-time laboratory services and a physiotherapy unit. Reviews highlight their well-equipped facilities, modern technology, good staff support and excellent treatment.

hospitals.name: Maricar Hospital
hospitals.description: Receives positive feedback for its dedicated doctors and staff, available 24/7. Patients have expressed satisfaction with their treatment and recovery outcomes. They are equipped with facilities such as operation theaters, X-rays, and scanning services.

hospitals.name: Swasthya Medical Centre's Maternity & Children's Hospital
hospitals.description: Specializes in obstetrics and gynecology, neonatology and pediatrics, and general surgery. It's a 15-bedded facility emphasizing specialized medical care and high-quality healthcare delivery. Reviewers praise the excellent care, courteous and helpful staff, and comfortable environment.

hospitals.name: Dr Kamakshi Memorial Hospital
hospitals.description: Known for its good healthcare and treatment. Patients appreciate the good behavior of the doctors and associates, and report reasonable rates for services.

hospitals.name: Apollo Clinic
hospitals.description: Although technically a clinic, it's mentioned in the context of top private healthcare providers in Andaman, according to Justdial. Reviewers appreciate the friendly and skilled staff, excellent services, and top-notch facilities. They are praised for their professionalism and commitment to patient care. It's described as one of the best private hospitals in Port Blair, with cooperative and supportive staff, friendly doctors, faster treatment, and specialist availability.

hospitals.name: All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), New Delhi
hospitals.description: A premier government hospital and medical institution, AIIMS is known for its comprehensive medical services, research, and education. Located in Ansari Nagar, New Delhi.

hospitals.name: Lok Nayak Hospital
hospitals.description: A large general hospital, one of the oldest and busiest in Delhi, providing a wide range of healthcare services, including specialized care in various departments.

hospitals.name: Dr. Ram Manohar Lohia Hospital
hospitals.description: A major government healthcare provider, offering services in multiple specialties and known for its role in public health. Located near Connaught Place, New Delhi.

hospitals.name: Safdarjung Hospital
hospitals.description: A prominent teaching hospital with a large patient capacity and diverse medical services. Located near AIIMS, New Delhi.

hospitals.name: Govind Ballabh Pant Hospital (G.B. Pant Hospital)
hospitals.description: Specializing in cardiology and related fields, G.B. Pant Hospital is a well-regarded government institution focusing on cardiovascular health. Located at Jawaharlal Nehru Marg, New Delhi.

hospitals.name: Indraprastha Apollo Hospitals
hospitals.description: A leading private hospital in Delhi, Indraprastha Apollo Hospitals is known for its advanced technology, specialized departments, and high-quality patient care. Located in Sarita Vihar, New Delhi.

hospitals.name: Max Healthcare (Max Super Speciality Hospital, Saket)
hospitals.description: With multiple facilities across Delhi, Max Healthcare offers a wide range of specialized medical services, including cancer care, cardiac sciences, and neurosciences.

hospitals.name: Fortis Healthcare (Fortis Flt Lt Rajan Dhall Hospital, Vasant Kunj)
hospitals.description: Fortis Hospital in Vasant Kunj and other locations in Delhi are known for their advanced medical infrastructure and comprehensive healthcare services.

hospitals.name: Medanta - The Medicity (Gurugram)
hospitals.description: Located in Gurugram, just outside Delhi, Medanta is a multi-specialty hospital recognized for its advanced medical facilities and expertise in various specialties.

hospitals.name: BLK-MAX Super Speciality Hospital
hospitals.description: This hospital offers a wide range of medical services, including specialized departments like cardiology, oncology, and neurology. Located at Pusa Road, New Delhi.
